long_description: The REI Endeavor vest keeps your core warm on mountain adventures with a technical fabric that blocks wind, repels moisture and stretches. Rugged double-weave polyester/spandex fabric provides 4-way stretch for excellent range of motion and comfort while on the trail; fabric resists abrasion. Fabric blocks wind to 30 mph and has a Durable Water Repellent coating to help shed moisture; also wicks moisture and dries quickly. With a UPF 50+ rating, fabric provides excellent protection against harmful ultraviolet rays. 2 hand pockets and 2 chest pockets feature welded zippers and provide storage for your trail essentials. Soft polyester tricot lines the collar to wick moisture and enhance comfort next to skin. Classic fit. REI Endeavor vest has a hem drawcord that lets you adjust the fit around the waist.
short_description: The REI Endeavor vest keeps your core warm on mountain adventures with a technical fabric that blocks wind, repels moisture and stretches.
